Title: An Act Converting the Manuk-Mangkaw Barangay High School in the Municipality of Simunul, Province of Tawi-Tawi, into a National High School to be Known as Manuk-Mangkaw National High School, and Authorizing the Appropriation of Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 448
An Act Converting the Manuk-Mangkaw Barangay High School in the Municipality of Simunul, Province of Tawi-Tawi, into a National High School to be Known as Manuk-Mangkaw National High School, and Authorizing the Appropriation of Funds Therefor
Section 1. The Manuk-Mangkaw Barangay High School in the Municipality of Simunul, Province of Tawi-Tawi, is hereby converted into a national high school, to be known as Manuk-Mangkaw National High School.
Section 2. The amount of one hundred thousand pesos for the operation of the school shall be funded out of the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Bilang 230 for the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports intended for new national high schools and an additional amount corresponding to fifty percent of its share in the budgetary aid actually paid to it before such conversion shall be released for its operation from the national assistance fund to local schools. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 10, 1983
